ProSteam Carpet Care is a family-owned carpet cleaning company operated right here in St. Charles, MO. Since our company opened the doors in 2002, weâ€™ve treated every customer like they were a part of our carpet cleaner family. 

Other companies may offer similar carpet cleaning and upholstery cleaning services, but our services are the best and they come with a personal touch. We offer multiple room specials, so you can call us direct and skip Groupon and the other "deal" sites.  We guarantee our work and we run five trucks on a daily basis so we can get to your job fast!

Call us direct at (636) 299-2925 and get a free quote in minutes over the phone!

ProSteam Carpet Care uses state-of-the-art truck mount equipment, and we offer much more than just basic carpet cleaning services.  We offer other cleaning services to homeowners in St. Charles and St. Louis, MO including...

Residential Carpet Cleaning 
Commercial Carpet Cleaning 
Upholstery Cleaning
Area Rug Cleaning 
Pet Stain Removal 
Air Duct Cleaning 
Tile and Grout Cleaning 
Oriental Rug Cleaning 
Carpet Water Damage Removal 
Carpet Mold and Mildew Removal 
Carpet Stain Removal
Leather Cleaning 
Fabric and Fiber Protection 
Carpet Scotch Guard
Teflon
Furniture Cleaning 
Hardwood Floor Cleaning 
Auto Carpet Cleaning
Boat Carpet Cleaning
RV Carpet Cleaning
and more!


We also offer guaranteed pet odor removal and DuPont Teflon to protect your investment. We offer many cleaning specials as well, and these change on a regular basis so please call and ask for our specials!

Call us direct at (636) 299-2925!

Thank you and we look forward to having you as a customer for years to come.

Sincerely, 

Gina Blake
Owner
Pro Steam Carpet Care and Restoration
